contentrichtext.text: The '''1909 Yukon general election''' was held on 28 June 1909 to elect the ten members of the [[Yukon Legislative Assembly|Yukon Territorial Council]]. The Council was non-partisan and had merely an advisory role to the federally appointed [[Commissioner#Canadian territories|Commissioner]]. The 1909 election marked the first time that voters in the territory elected the entire council â€” in the four prior elections, the council was composed of five elected representatives and five representatives appointed by the Canadian federal government. ==References== * {{Cite web|url=http://www.electionsyukon.gov.yk.ca/gen-elections.html|title=General Elections|work=Elections Yukon|accessdate=2007-01-06}} {{YU Elections}} [[Category:Elections in Yukon]] [[Category:1909 elections in Canada]] {{Yukon-stub}} {{Canada-election-stub}}
